item.title: My 2017 Book List
item.description: Books I read in 2017. Never Split the Difference Negotiating as if Your Life Depended on It By: Chris Voss Man’s Search for Meaning By: Viktor E. Frankl Start with Why How Great Leaders Inspire Everyone to Take Action By: Simon Sinek Leaders Eat Last Why Some Teams Pull Together and Others Don’t By: Simon Sinek Who Moved My Cheese? An Amazing Way to Deal with Change in Your Work and in Your Life By: Spencer Johnson Lead and Disrupt How to Solve the Innovator’s Dilemma By: Charles A.

item.title: My 2016 Book List
item.description: Books I read in 2016. The Phoenix Project A Novel About IT, DevOps, and Helping Your Business Win By: Gene Kim , Kevin Behr , George Spafford The Like Switch An Ex-FBI Agent’s Guide to Influencing, Attracting, and Winning People Over By: Jack Schafer , Marvin Karlins Team of Teams New Rules of Engagement for a Complex World By: General Stanley McChrystal , Tantum Collins , David Silverman , Chris Fussell The Essential Guide for Hiring & Getting Hired Performance-based Hiring Series By: Lou Adler How to Win Friends & Influence People By: Dale Carnegie Presence Bringing Your Boldest Self to Your Biggest Challenges By: Amy Cuddy Site Reliability Engineering How Google Runs Production Systems By: Betsy Beyer,‎ Chris Jones,‎ Jennifer Petoff,‎ Niall Richard Murphy
